segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite busy, in a line drawing style.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink, completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the edge in a steady sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, getting everything wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands right there, drying a plate, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually in the growing puddle, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it quite astonishing that she doesn't notice the gushing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so engrossed in a task?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain must be completely blocked or there's no plug at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water damage is going to be extensive if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about someone slipping on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside provides such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen right before her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is quite a puzzle.
segments.speaker: PAR
